domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.

text: @elonmusk YES!  In Hong Kong and Taiwan, it’s common knowledge that coronavirus panic might have been used as a weapon to lock down the world and create a global surveillance state.  Political cartoons like this are used to quickly share that message with the world. #ChinaLiedPeopleDied https://t.co/6QO1mBQKLV
